error.message: Call to deprecated method getUsername() of class Drupal\user\Entity\User. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Session\AccountInterface::getAccountName() or \Drupal\user\UserInterface::getDisplayName() instead.

Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to business_rules.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
